Job Description: Responsibilities and Duties:   Good knowledge of WordPress theme customization  Experience in developing web applications, e-Commerce, Portal, Custom web application using PHP, WordPress  Skills in API integrations, Plugins, and excellent knowledge of MySQL  Clean code, good understanding, and skills in schema tags, etc.  Quick to troubleshoot, test, and improve page speed and cross-browser compatibility and maintain databases to ensure strong optimization and functionality   Key Skills  PHP, WordPress, MySQL ,HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Ajax   Required Experience and Qualifications  Any Graduate  Minimum 6 months of hands on experience with WordPress Web Development.   Benefits  5 Day a week work culture. High potential of career growth along with leadership roles.
